channel.title: Deltascape, when u die you dont,
channel.description:
WELL, IM HERE TO ASK U THIS,
does any1 no how to make this on - deltascape, when u die you dont, lose your items,
if any1 no's cud you put it here please, pl0x

item.title: Deltascape, when u die you dont,
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

[quote=“primadude, post:6, topic:240189”][quote author=kihomura link=topic=316478.msg2513378#msg2513378 date=1225413376]
Create a void that removes your weapons and armor, then add it into your method for when a player dies.
[/quote]

That wouldn’t work if you had A full inventory.[/quote]

Well, depends on if you make the void remove or delete your equipment

Read full topic
item.source: Deltascape, when u die you dont,

item.title: Deltascape, when u die you dont,
item.dc:creator: @gunz4life gunz4life
item.description:
@gunz4life wrote:

actually… tbh its because player rights 2 dont lose items player rights 0, 1 does… because so admins dont have thier friends killing them and get items like blk armor ect.

Read full topic

in client.java
